Verses: 1 movaabaikkuriththu Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Aiyo! Nepo Paazhaakkappattadhu; Keeriyaaththaayeem Vetkappattu, Pidikkappattuppoyitru; Miskaab Vetkappattu, Kalangippoyitru.

2 esponaikkuriththu Movaabukku Irundha Peththarikkam Ini Iraadhu; Adhu Oru Jaadhiyaayiraadhapadikku Adhai Nirmoolamaakkuven Vaarungalendru Adharku Virodhamaagap Pollaappai Ninaiththirukkiraargal; Madhmene, Neeyum Sangaaramaavaai; Pattayam Unnaiththodarum.
3 paazhkkadippinaalum Periya Norukkudhalinaalum Undaagira Kooppidudhalin Saththam Oronaayimilirundhu Ketkappadum.
4 movaab Norungundadhu; Adhilulla Siruvargal Kooppidum Saththam Ketkappadugiradhu.
5 loogiththukku Erippogira Vazhiyile Azhugaiyinmel Azhugai Ezhumbum; Oronaayimukku Irangippogira Vazhiyile Norukkudhal Seygiradhinaal Undaagiya Kookkuralai Saththurukkal Ketkiraargal.
6 ungal Praanan Thappa Odippongal; Vanaandharaththilulla Karalaiyaaippona Sediyaippoliruppeergal.
7 nee Un Sambaththaiyum Un Pokkishangalaiyum Nambugirapadiyinaale Neeyum Pidikkappaduvaai, Appozhudhu Kemosh Siraiyaakkappattuppom; Adhin Aasaariyarum Prabukkalum Egamaai Siraippattuppovaargal.
8 paazhaakkugiravan Ellaap Pattanangalinmelum Varuvaan; Oru Pattanamum Thappippovadhillai; Pallaththaakkugalum Kettuppogum; Samanaana Boomiyum Azhikkappadum Endru Karththar Sonnaar.
9 movaabukku Settaigalaik Kodungal; Adhu Parandhupogattum; Adhin Pattanangal Kudigalillaamal Paazhaaippogum.
10 karththarudaiya Velaiyai Asadhiyaai Seygiravan Sabikkappattavan; Raththam Sindhaadhapadikkuth Than Pattayaththai Adakkikkollugiravan Sabikkappattavan.

11 movaab Than Siruvayadhumudhal Sugamaai Vaazhndhadhu; Adhu Oru Paaththiraththilirundhu Maru Paaththiraththil Vaarkkappadaamalum, Adhin Vandalgalin Mel Asaiyaamalum Irundhadhu; Adhu Siraiyiruppukkup Ponadhillai; Aadhalaal Adhin Rusi Adhil Nilaiththirundhadhu; Adhin Vaasanai Verupadavillai.

12 aagaiyaal, Idho, Naatkal Varumendru Karththar Sollugiraar, Appozhudhu Kavizhththuppodugiravargalai Adharku Anuppuven; Avargal Adhaik Kavizhththu, Adhin Paaththirangalai Verumaiyaakki, Adhin Jaadigalai Udaiththuppoduvaargal.
13 appozhudhu Isravel Sandhadhi Thangal Nambikkaiyaana Beththelaale Vetkappattadhupola, Movaab Kemoshaale Vetkappadum.
14 naangal Paraakkiramasaaligalendrum, Naangal Yuththasannaththarendrum Neengal Sollugiradhenna?
15 movaab Azhindhadhu, Adhin Pattanangal Erindhupoyina; Adhin Thiramaiyulla Vaalibar Kolaikkalaththukku Irangugiraargal Endru Senaigalin Karththarennum Naamamulla Raajaa Sollugiraar.
16 movaabin Aabaththuvara Sameebamaayirukkiradhu; Adhin Theengu Migavum Theeviriththuvarugiradhu.
17 adhin Sutruppuraththaarum Adhin Perai Arindhavargalumaagiya Neengal Ellaarum Adharkaaga Angalaaiththuk Kollungal; Belanaana Thadiyum Alangaaramaana Kolum Eppadi Udaindhadhendru Sollungal.
18 theepon Pattanavaasiyaana Kumaaraththiye, Nee Un Magimaiyai Vittirangi, Thaagaththode Utkaarndhiru; Movaabaip Paazhaakkugiravan Unakku Virodhamaai Vandhu, Un Arangalai Azhiththuppoduvaan..
19 aaroveril Kudiyirukkiravale, Nee Vazhiyile Nindru Paarththukkondiru; Nadandhadhennavendru Odivarugiravanaiyum Thappivarugiravanaiyum Kel.
20 movaab Muriya Adikkappattapadiyinaal Kalangippoyitru; Alarikkooppidungal; Movaab Paazhaakkappattadhendru Arnonil Ariviyungal.
21 samanaana Boomiyaagiya Olonin Melum, Yaadhsaavinmelum, Mepkaaththinmelum,
22 theeponinmelum, Nepovin Melum, Peththiplaaththaayeemin Melum,
23 keeriyaaththaayeemin Melum, Pedhgamoolinmelum, Peththemeyoninmelum,
24 keeriyoththinmelum, Posraavinmelum, Movaab Dhesaththile Dhooraththilum Sameebaththilum Irukkira Ellaap Pattanangalin Melum Nyaayaththeerppu Varum.
25 movaabin Kombu Vettundadhu; Avan Buyam Murikkappattadhu Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
26 avanai Verikolla Seyyungal; Karththarukku Virodhamaaip Perumaipaaraattinaan; Movaab Thaan Vaandhipanni Adhile Puraluvaan; Avan Pariyaasaththukkidamaavaan.
27 isravel Unakkup Pariyaasamaayirundhaan Allavo? Avan Thirudarukkul Kandupidikkappattaano? Nee Avanaikkuriththup Pesugirapodhellaam, Thalaiyaith Thulukkugiraaye.
28 movaab Dhesaththin Kudigale, Neengal Pattanangalai Vittuppoi Kanmalaiyil Thangi, Kugaiyin Vaai Orangalil Koodukattugira Puraavukku Oppaayirungal..
29 avan Meththap Perumaikkaaran, Movaabin Perumaiyaiyum, Avan Mettimaiyaiyum, Avan Agandhaiyaiyum, Avan Peththarikkaththaiyum, Avan Irudhayaththin Mettimaiyaiyum Kuriththuk Ketten.
30 avan Moorkkaththai Naan Ariven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Appadiyaagaadhu, Avan Veembu Sellaadhu Engiraar.
31 aagaiyaal Movaabinimiththam Naan Alari, Movaab Dhesam Anaiththinimiththamum Kookkuraliduven; Keeraares Manusharinimiththam Perumoochchu Vidappadum.

32 sipmaavoorin Dhraatchachchediye, Yaaserukkaaga Naan Azhudhadhupola Unakkaagavum Azhuven; Un Kodigal Kadalaik Kadandhupoyina; Avaigal Yaaser Kadalmattum Poi Ettina; Paazhaakkugiravan Un Vasandha Kaalaththup Pazhangalin Melum, Un Dhraatchappazha Aruppinmelum Vizhundhaan.

33 payirveliyilum Movaab Dhesaththilumirundhu Sandhoshamum Kalippum Neengippoyitru; Dhraatcharasam Aalaigalilirundhu Pozhigiradhai Oyappanninen; Aalaiyai Midhikkiravargalin Paadal Illai; Adhu Aaravaarameyallaamal Aalai Midhikkum Paadalalla.

34 espon Thuvakki Eleyaale Mattum Yaagaasvaraikkum Undaagum Kookkuralinimiththam Avargal Moondruvayadhuk Kadaariyaippol, Sovaar Thuvakki Oronaayimmattum Saththamiduvaargal; Nimreemin Jalangalum Vatrippogum.
35 movaabdhesaththu Medaigalil Paliyidugiravanaiyum Than Dhevargalukkuth Thoobankaattugiravanaiyum Oyappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

36 aagaiyaal, Movaabinimiththam En Irudhayam Naagasuram Pol Thuyaramaai Thonikkum; Keeraares Manusharinimiththamum, En Irudhayam Naagasuram Pol Thuyaramaai Thonikkum; Avargal Sambaadhiththa Aisuvariyam Azhindhu Pogirapadiyinaal Appadith Thonikkum.
37 thalaigal Ellaam Mottaiyidappattum, Thaadigal Ellaam Kaththarikkappattum Irukkum; Kaigalil Ellaam Keerudhalgalum, Araigalil Rattuduppum Undu.
38 movaabin Sagala Veedugalin Melum Adhin Therukkalileyum Egappulambal Undaagum; Oruvarum Virumbappadaadha Paaththirampola Movaabai Udaiththuppotten Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
39 movaab Evvalavaai Murindhupoyitrendru Alarugiraargal; Adhu Mudhugaikkaatti Evvalavaai Vetkappadum? Ippadi Movaab Than Sutruppuraththaar Anaivarukkum Pariyaasamum Thigaippumaayirukkum
40 idho, Oruvan Kazhugaippol Parandhuvandhu, Movaabinmel Than Settaigalai Virippaan.
41 keeriyodh Pidikkappadum, Kottaigal Kaivasamaagum; Annaalile Movaabin Paraakkiramasaaligaludaiya Irudhayam Prasavavedhanaippadugira Sthreeyin Irudhayampola Irukkum.
42 movaab Karththarukku Virodhamaaip Perumaipaaraattinapadiyaal, Adhu Oru Janamaayiraadhapadikku Azhikkappadum.
43 movaab Dhesaththin Kudiyaanavane, Thigilum, Padukuzhiyum, Kanniyum Unmel Varum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

44 thigilukku Vilaga Odugiravan Padu Kuzhiyile Vizhuvaan; Padukuzhiyilirundhu Erugiravano Kanniyile Pidipaduvaan; Avargal Visaarikkappadum Varushaththai Adhinmel, Adhaavadhu, Movaabinmel Varappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

45 valladikkuth Thappa Odippogiravargal Esponin Nizhalil Thariththu Nindraargal, Aanaalum Neruppu Esponilum, Akkinijuvaalai Seekon Naduvilumirundhu Purappattu, Movaab Dhesaththin Ellaigalaiyum, Kalagancheygiravargalin Uchchanthalaiyaiyum Patchikkum.
46 movaabe, Unakku Aiyo! Kemosh Vikkiragaththaiyaduththa Janam Azhiyum, Un Kumaararum Siraipidikkappadugiraargal, Un Kumaaraththigalum Siraipidikkappattuppogiraargal.
47 aanaalum Kadaisinaatkalil Movaabin Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar. Movaabinmel Varum Nyaayaththeerppin Seydhi Iththode Mudindhadhu.
